texts.value: Oxidant stress-activated serine/threonine kinase that may play a role in the response to environmental stress. Targets to the Golgi apparatus where it appears to regulate protein transport events, cell adhesion, and polarity complexes important for cell migration

Interaction with Golgi matrix protein GOLGA2 leads to autophosphorylation on Thr-174, possibly as a consequence of stabilization of dimer formation. The C-terminal non-catalytic region inhibits the kinase activity
Ubiquitously expressed. Highest levels are found in testis, large intestine, brain and stomach followed by heart and lung
Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. STE Ser/Thr protein kinase family. STE20 subfamily

features.description: Loss of kinase activity and autophosphorylation.

citation.title: Activation of a human Ste20-like kinase by oxidant stress defines a novel stress response pathway.
YSK1, a novel mammalian protein kinase structurally related to Ste20 and SPS1, but is not involved in the known MAPK pathways.
Cloning of human full-length CDSs in BD Creator(TM) system donor vector.
Complete sequencing and characterization of 21,243 full-length human cDNAs.
Generation and annotation of the DNA sequences of human chromosomes 2 and 4.
The status, quality, and expansion of the NIH full-length cDNA project: the Mammalian Gene Collection (MGC).
YSK1 is activated by the Golgi matrix protein GM130 and plays a role in cell migration through its substrate 14-3-3zeta.
A PP2A phosphatase high density interaction network identifies a novel striatin-interacting phosphatase and kinase complex linked to the cerebral cavernous malformation 3 (CCM3) protein.
Initial characterization of the human central proteome.

referencePositions: IDENTIFICATION BY MASS SPECTROMETRY [LARGE SCALE ANALYSIS]

properties.value: Expressed in hindlimb stylopod muscle and 181 other tissues
P:establishment or maintenance of cell polarity
P:intrinsic apoptotic signaling pathway in response to hydrogen peroxide
P:positive regulation of stress-activated MAPK cascade
